title: Creating a Basic Server
description: Spin up a server that handles requests.
content: Let’s write the smallest server we can. We won’t handle any login yet.

flask.code:
from flask import Flask
app = Flask(__name__)
@app.route('/')
def home(): return 'Hello'
app.run()

django.code: # Already done with runserver — just visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/
